sections.title: Magic Weapons Overview
sections.description: Core rules for magic weapons including enhancement bonuses, special abilities, pricing, materials, ammunition interactions, activation, and random generation tables

sections.title: Melee Weapon Special Abilities
sections.description: Random generation tables for melee weapon special abilities organized by bonus equivalent from +1 to +5, including ability names, price modifiers, and sources

sections.title: Ranged Weapon Special Abilities
sections.description: Random generation tables for ranged weapon special abilities organized by bonus equivalent, including abilities specific to bows, crossbows, firearms, and thrown weapons

sections.description: Random generation tables for ammunition special abilities including arrows, bolts, bullets, and firearm cartridges with their bonus equivalents and price modifiers

sections.description: Random generation tables for specific named magic weapons organized by treasure level from lesser minor to greater major, with prices and sources

sections.description: Reference to additional magic weapons and special abilities from third-party publishers available on d20pfsrd.com
